name: Cydonia: Mars - The First Manned Mission
name_original: Cydonia: Mars - The First Manned Mission
description:
Cydonia: Mars - The First Manned Mission is an adventure game developed by Aneiva Interactive. It was originally released in 1998. Zablac Entertainment published the game.
You can play Cydonia: Mars - The First Manned Mission on PC.
